short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Pokemon TCG Pocket Online Browser Extension.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
TCG Pocket Online Browser.
















































Pokémon TCG Pocket Online is a browser extension that enhances your experience on the official Pokémon website. It includes features for accessibility and convenience:

Dark Mode: Reduce eye strain with a dark theme for easier viewing in low light.
Image Enlargement: Click on any image to see it in a larger overlay, ideal for viewing card details.
Picture-in-Picture (PiP) for Videos: Double-click videos to pop them out in a floating window, letting you browse freely, this extension is unofficial.
